name: Slow Cooker Spicy Chicken
ingredients: 1 cup sweet baby rays hot sauce
instructions: Dump all cook low 7hrs pull apart chicken after 7hrs stirr in 1 tbsp butter let cook for one more hour

name: Boiled Breakfast sausage
instructions: add defrosted sausage and water to pan place lid on. Boil sausage 20 to 25 min
notes: Best way to cook sausage without a grill
